I enjoy my tea while I am working on my goals, and it helps me stay focused and productive.

content.text: I'm looking forward to moving to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend! What are your goals for the future?
I'd love to travel the world, and I'm currently working on some new app ideas for my phone. What about you?
I'm trying to relieve my bloating with a hot cup of tea, and I'd love to have lunch with Amelia Earhart!
Oh no, are you not feeling well? I love tea too, it's great for relaxing and staying focused.
I'm okay, I just have a lot of gas from eating too much broccoli.
I can relate! I love broccoli but it always makes me bloated.
I'm from Algeria originally, and I love to experiment with different colors and styles in my clothing.
That's so cool! I'm from the US, and I love to be creative with my wardrobe too.
I'm an interior designer, so I'm always looking for new ways to make my home look amazing.
That sounds like a really fun job! I love designing my own space.
I'm hoping to move to Australia soon to marry my boyfriend, who is from there.
That's so exciting! I'm sure you'll love it there.
I think so too! I've always wanted to live in Australia.
I'm sure you'll have a great time
